Directions: In a bowl, beat egg and milk. Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt; stir into egg mixture just until moistened. Fold in potatoes and parsley. Fill greased muffin cups two-thirds full.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.  Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups mashed potatoes (prepared with milk and butter)
